snippet: Brian Stropolo, a side judge scheduled to work Sunday's Saint-Panthers game, had posted pictures of himself on his Facebook page in Saints apparel at a tailgate party during a preseason game.
abstract: Brian Stropolo, a side judge scheduled to work Sunday's Saint-Panthers game, had posted pictures of himself on his Facebook page in Saints apparel at a tailgate party during a preseason game.

headline.main: Replacement Official Removed From Crew for Being a Saints Fan
headline.print_headline: Replacement Official Pulled for Being a Fan
